column4: Hi... has anyone done un upgrade from Heron -> Ibex, on a box with LILO+LVM ?
I'm a bit scared because past kernel upgrades have left my box unbootable.
And I can't use GRUB due to a BIOS bug
if the update of lilo works you should have no problems
Sadly, that's not my experience.  :(
lilo use on ubuntu is rare
it is important to understand what is at fault so you don't say "i've got a lilo issue"
I don't have a LILO issue.  I've had one in the past.
I'm just looking for someone who's tested this and can confirm it worked for them
then why mention it in your initial request
tested what ?
In the past, I had serious issues doing an upgrade, because the packages did not notice that LILO required extra options for the kernel it installed.
I have upgraded and it worked there you go, I have confirmed it worked
From Hardy to Intrepid, on a machine with LILO?
one of my test machines is a box with lilo to look at booting from lvm /boot partitions
because it worked for me does not mean it will workf or you, I had different hardware in a different configuration
no, it updated fine
No indeed, I understand this... but if there were several people here who had tried, and it had failed, that would be useful information to me.  Surely you see that? :)
but as pretty much no-one would be using lilo, I think your not going to get the confidence you want.
Fine, sorry for bothering you all.  I'll check how popular my software is before asking next time :P
your not bothering anyone, I'm just explaining that pretty much no-one will be using your configurtation, so waiting for multiple people to say "it works" is probably not going to happen
Well, I got one already... so it wasn't a totally foolish tactic.  I know it's not a cast iron garuntee but it's better than trying totally blind.
